column2: for far too long have I grown powerful while your own realm has stagnated. Please accept this small token of §Y[gold_receiver.gold_given.GetValue]§! gold coins as reward for still existing. From your biggest rival \nLove §Y[gold_giver.GetFullName]§!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
